org.gljiva.trPuzzleCorner.p2006nd3
Class Num3

java.lang.Object
  org.gljiva.trPuzzleCorner.p2006nd3.Num3
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, Comparable<Num3>
public class Num3
extends Object
implements Cloneable, Comparable<Num3>

Class to implement 3-digit numbers, with digit manipulation. Note: this class has a natural ordering that is inconsistent with equals. If you want an ordering consistent with equals, you can use the COMPARE_CURRENT comparator.

Author:
bert

COMPARE_UNFLIPPED

public static Comparator<Num3> COMPARE_UNFLIPPED
A comparator that compares the "unflipped" values of the numbers, so that, for example, COMPARE_UNFLIPPED.compare((new Num3(123)).flipped(), new Num3(123)) returns 0. Note: this comparator is inconsistent with equals.

COMPARE_CURRENT

public static Comparator<Num3> COMPARE_CURRENT
A comparator that compares the "current" values of the numbers, so that, for example, COMPARE_CURRENT.compare((new Num3(123)).flipped(), new Num3(321)) returns 0. Note: this comparator is consistent with equals.

COMPARE_DEFAULT

public static Comparator<Num3> COMPARE_DEFAULT
The default comparator. This is the same as COMPARE_UNFLIPPED.
